name: 劉立雯
objective:
This course analyzes what makes a speaker sound dynamic and enthusiastic. It identifies the key skills employed by all effective presenters. The basics of introducing your topic, structuring your talk and referring to visual aids will be dealt with in the class.

學習如何以英語做論文發表, 熟悉常用字彙,句型, 正確語調及斷句, 視覺輔具,以及用適合的諺語加強內容的說明力 。
